Luhut Terima Mendag AS, Bicara Pabrik Baterai Mobil Listrik di RI
06 Nov 2019, 09:50 by Anisa Indraini


Foto: Menko Maritim Luhut Binsar Pandjaitan bertemu Menteri Perdagangan AS Wilbur Ross (Anisa Indraini/detikFinance)

Jakarta - Menteri Koordinator Bidang Kemaritiman dan Investasi Luhut Binsar Pandjaitan siang ini menggelar rapat dengan Menteri Perdagangan Amerika Serikat (AS), Wilbur Ross.Hadir juga beberapa perusahaan seperti Tesla, China Contemporary Amperex Technology (CATL), VOLKSwagen, Mercedes, BMW, dan masih banyak lagi.Pantauan detikcom, rapat dilakukan selama kurang lebih satu jam. Pertemuan itu salah satunya membahas investasi dalam bidang baterai di Morowali, Sulawesi Tengah."Tadi saya coba ajak mereka untuk Tesla nanti bersama-sama CATL, VOLKSwagen, Mercedes, BMW, untuk investasi dalam bidang baterai," kata Luhut di kantornya, Rabu (6/11/2019).Terkait itu, Luhut meminta agar sentimen negatif di Morowali dihilangkan karena konsorsium investor pendiri pabrik baterai lithium di Morowali adalah LG, CATL, Volkswagen, Tesla hingga Mercedes."Jadi saya kira sekarang ini jangan lihat China, jangan lihat Amerika, sekarang semua dunia itu sudah mulai terintegrasi," imbuhnya.Lebih lanjut, Luhut bilang, saat ini masih ada kesenjangan tarif ekspor yang dikenakan pada pengimporan slicksteel sebesar 25%."Tadi kita juga bicarakan bahwa perusahaan dari Amerika juga mengimpor slicksteel dari Morowali tapi kenapa tarif 25%, tapi kita bersihkan tadi kan semi produk, semi finish produk. Jadi di Amerika masih di proses lagi. Jadi dengan Morowali ada beda sekarang," terang Luhut.Untuk itu, dalam waktu dekat Kementerian Luar Negeri akan menyelesaikan Generalized System of Preference (GSP) terkait perjanjian biaya ekspor dan impor."Jadi kita harap dalam waktu dekat GSP itu akan selesai dan tidak ada lagi pending isu," kata Luhut. Luhut Accepts the US Minister of Trade, Talks about the Electric Car Battery Factory in RI
Nov 6, 2019, 09:50 by Anisa Indraini


Photo: Maritime Coordinating Minister Luhut Binsar Pandjaitan meets US Trade Minister Wilbur Ross (Anisa Indraini / detikFinance)

Jakarta - The Coordinating Minister for Maritime Affairs and Investment Luhut Binsar Pandjaitan this afternoon held a meeting with the United States Minister of Trade (US), Wilbur Ross. Also present were several companies such as Tesla, China Contemporary Amperex Technology (CATL), VOLKSwagen, Mercedes, BMW, and still more. Monitoring AFP, the meeting was held for approximately one hour. One of the meetings discussed investment in the battery sector in Morowali, Central Sulawesi. "I tried to invite them to Tesla later together with CATL, VOLKSwagen, Mercedes, BMW, for investment in the battery sector," Luhut said in his office, Wednesday (6 / 11/2019).In connection with that, Luhut requested that negative sentiments in Morowali be eliminated because the consortium of investors founding lithium battery factories in Morowali were LG, CATL, Volkswagen, Tesla to Mercedes. " "Now, all of the world has begun to be integrated," he added. Furthermore, Luhut said, currently there is still a gap in export tariffs imposed on importing slicksteel by 25%. "Earlier we also talked about that American companies also import slicksteel from Morowali but why the tariff is 25%, but we have cleaned the semi-product, the semi-finished product. So in America it is still being processed again. So with Morowali there is a difference now, "explained Luhut. "In the near future, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs will complete the Generalized System of Preference (GSP) related to export and import cost agreements." So we hope that in the near future the GSP will be finished and there will be no pending issues, "said Luhut.
